full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/10/2023 Tc 465 A17 224552 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUS Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Service Budget Bureau No. 43-R423 & VEATOS AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (Fill in with typewriter or print in block letters in ink) I, SAIDUL ZAFAR CHOUDHRY Residing at 5376 IRVINGTON PLACE (Name) (Street and number) LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA UNITED STATES OFAMERICA (City) (State) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. BAHAWALPUR I was born on JULY 8,1940 at PAKISTAN Also, answer either a, b or c, as appropriate. (Date) (City) (Country) (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization 8697141 . (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship . If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number . . 2. That I am 27 years of age and have resided in the United States since SEPTEMBER 8, 1959 . 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 5376 IRVINGTON PLACE, LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO NAME SEX AGE COUNTRY OF BIRTH SINGLE DEPONENT BIBI CHOUDHRY F 53 PAKISTAN WIDOW MOTHER . 4. (a) That I am employed as or engaged in the business of ACCOUNTANT with TRW SYSTEMS ONE SPACE PARK (Name of concern) at REDONDO BEACH, CAL and derive a net annual income of $8034.00 (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) banks in this country $ 2600.00c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $2000.00 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ 0.00 , market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 5376 IRVINGTO PLACE valued at $ 17500.00 with mortgages or other encumbrances thereon amounting to $ 9000.00 N (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $ $15000.00 , cash surrender value of $ . (g) That if self- employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commercial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See reverse side for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) Form I-134 (Rev 5-1-64)
